data.name: Mixed Guns Demo
data.detailed_description:
Run & Gun

it's a good old side scrolling shooter, just like games such as Contra or Metal Slug, but with modern improvments, and unique to the genre mechanics, fight your way through many levels, to reach [REDACTED]





Mixing Guns

As title says, it's the main mechanic of the game, collect upgrades and weapons to mix, every weapon has thier own use, so mix your guns accordingly to the encounters you may experience!





Deep Lore

This game has deep lore, deeper than all 14 yr olds combined, so what you are waiting for, make a video explaining 2 minutes of random pictures for 2 hours!


Features

  • Campaign with full story
  • 9 totally unique killing devices
  • Tons of enemies, i'll give a total number when i finish adding them all lol
  • Bossfights
  • Arena mode (Coming soon)
  • And much more!

data.short_description: Thirsty for a good old Side Scrolling shoot 'em up? Well i got ya covered, fight your way through levels, covered with countless unique enemies, grab your guns and mix them togheter with sick upgrades, to create even sicker guns!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: dual core 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel hd 520
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not final lol
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: Not final lol
